course.title: Diploma in Quantity Surveying
course.description: This programme opens the door to the modern construction world, guiding learners into the art and science of quantity surveying. It equips you with the practical knowledge needed to support cost planning, procurement, contract management, and the financial control of construction projects. Across Levels 4 and 5, you’ll build your capabilities step-by-step from understanding measurement and estimating, to handling variations, claims, and contract adistration within real-world project environments, including large-scale developments. Completing this diploma also provides a pathway to progress directly into the final stages of a relevant university degree, enabling you to advance toward a BSc (Hons) in Quantity Surveying with advanced entry.
course.entry_requirements: Open to learners aged 17+ with a Level 3 qualification in Quantity Surveying or an equivalent pathway. If you’re ready to step into the construction world, this course welcomes you
